query: Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo gravel race Francis Marion National Forest

videos.title: Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo 2023
videos.description: Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo in 2023. It was a fun, wet, muddy ride. This was gravel riding in South Carolina.
tags: Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo; Gravel Ride

videos.title: Backpacking The Swamp Fox Passage! Francis Marion National Forest Hidden Gem.
videos.description:
Evelyn and I head out for an early January, three day hike on the 47 mile Swamp Fox Passage in Francis Marion National Forest and are joined by Mom on Day 2, who does our first ever backpacking baking!!

Join and support the channel:
Patreon Memberships: www.patreon.com/howesthehike

Buy gear and support the channel:

REI (USA) 
https://rei.pxf.io/DyB6qq

MEC (Canada)
https://alnk.to/btnkVxS

Sponsorships and other services:  howesthehike.ca

At 47 miles, (75.6km) the Swamp Fox Passage is the longest section of the cross-state Palmetto Trail in South Carolina. The passage traverses four distinct ecosystems through Francis Marion National Forest, including swamps made famous as hideouts of Revolutionary War hero Francis Marion.


00:00 Intro
22:38 Day Two                                                 
35:20 Baking with Mom                                
41:02 I invent a new animal due to a typo
41:27  Day Three
54:25 Howe's the Hike?                                                

palmettoconservation.org/palmetto-trail

www.fs.usda.gov/scnfs

We checked after the hike about hunting and were told the following:

“There is always small game hunting along with early morning/evening Duck hunting until March… and there is also raccoon hunting, fox hunting at night”
